issue.title: [C++] Extract the core of NumericTensor<T>::Value as Tensor::Value<T>
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6319](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6319). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I'd like to enable element-wise access in Tensor class.

comments.body:
